item.title: TechCrunch Minute: How to protect yourself from AI scams
item.description:
You probably like to think of yourself as reasonably sophisticated when it comes to online scams — you’re not opening random email attachments or sending money to Nigerian princes. But of course, scams evolve with new technology. AI makes it even easier to perform these attacks at scale, while introducing a little personalization that makes […]

item.title: Tembo capitalizes on the database boom and lands new cash to expand
item.description:
One of the vendors to benefit from the database boom is Tembo, a startup creating a platform that lets developers deploy different flavors of Postgres.

item.title: Chinese MIPS rival to Intel and AMD set to launch a 128-core server CPU to compete in the busy market — EPYC and Xeon fans need not worry for now but do keep an eye on the NVLink-like tech
Windows 11 Notepad gets spellcheck, autocorrect 41 years later
item.description: Microsoft's stripped-down Windows text editor can finally play with the big boys.

item.title: There are already some great discounts on 2-in-1 laptops ahead of Amazon Prime Day
item.description: As of July 8, there's a pretty strong collection of 2-in-1 laptop deals that are live ahead of Amazon Prime Day 2024. Check out our top deals from Acer, HP, and more brands.
